answers.answer: I would say no news is good news. I also failed my 1 hour glucose test on December 22nd and I had to take the 3 hour one december 31st and a day later I got a call saying i failed. So I would take it that you have passed.
At my doctor office they told me they will call if I ever have baf test results and if they dont call not to worry but you can always call them and ask to talk to a nurse about your results
When i took my 1 hour one they never called me so I assumed u passed. :)

Thanks ladies i literally called christmas eve and that friday after Christmas and was told they werent in yet. Called the following monday and they said the dr didnt read them yet so im assuming the same. Now if i go into my appt thursday and they say i have it im gonna be sooo mad. I failed the first one w flying colors but i also had been very sick, bedridden with the flu for about 3 days i took it bc i was already there for a routine check up ... Figured might as well. But the 1 hr read for my first test and second test were completely different my 2nd test read about 105 points lower so we shall see.

question: Had my 3 hour glucose test after failing the 1 hour on dec 23rd ... Havent heard anything from my dr ... Can i assume no news is good news and im in the clear?
title: gestational diabetes test...
